public final class StringOpener
extends RefOpener
The Opener for Strings likes to be primitive

STRING_TYPE

StringOpener(OpenerRecipe)

commentary()
StringOpeners currently need no commentary, so they currently return null.
decodeBody(Object, RtDecoder)
Does nothing, since Strings only have preface
decodePreface(RtDecoder)
The preface is the string in UTF
encodeBody(Object, RtEncoder)
Does nothing, since Strings only have preface
encodePreface(Object, RtEncoder)
The preface is the string in UTF
toString()
Returns a String that represents the value of this Object.
